author: Monica Alba
title: Trump campaign renews focus on Hunter Biden in controversial China ad
description: As President Trump's campaign gears up for a general election face-off with apparent Democratic nominee Joe Biden, it's also reintroducing attacks against the former vice president’s son and his business dealings.
content:
WASHINGTON  As President Trump's campaign gears up for a general election face-off with apparent Democratic nominee Joe Biden, it's also reintroducing attacks against the former vice presidents son and his business dealings with China.
In a new digital ad re… [+28677 chars]
